text: Razve ty ne videl tekh, kotorym skazali: "Uderzhite vashi ruki i prostaivayte molitvu i davayte ochishcheniye". - a kogda predpisano bylo im srazheniye, to vot - chast' ikh strashitsya lyudey tak zhe, kak strashitsya Allakha ili yeshche bol'shim strakhom? I skazali oni: "Gospodi nash! Pochemu predpisal Ty nam srazheniye? Yesli by Ty otlozhil nam do blizkogo sroka?" Skazhi: "Pol'zovaniye zdeshney zhizn'yu - nedolgo, a poslednyaya zhizn' - luchshe dlya togo, kto boyalsya, i ne budete vy obizheny ni na finikovuyu plevu
